question: Can you suggest a diet plan for someone who wants to build muscle and generate an image of a balanced meal for muscle gain?

steps.content: Can you suggest a diet plan for someone who wants to build muscle and generate an image of a balanced meal for muscle gain?
Plan: 1) Search for a diet plan suitable for muscle building. 2) Generate an image of a balanced meal for muscle gain. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for a diet plan for muscle building.

Diet plan for muscle gain: Breakfast - 4 egg omelette with spinach and cheese, 1 cup oatmeal with berries. Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, steamed broccoli. Dinner - Salmon, sweet potato, mixed greens salad. Snacks - Greek yogurt with almonds, protein shake.
Generating an image of a balanced meal for muscle gain.
Image of a balanced meal for muscle gain generated.
Can you also include a vegetarian option for lunch?
Plan: 1) Search for a vegetarian lunch option for muscle building. 2) Return the updated diet plan.
Searching for a vegetarian lunch option for muscle building.
Vegetarian lunch option: Lentil salad with chickpeas, quinoa, cherry tomatoes, and avocado.

Diet plan for muscle gain: Breakfast - 4 egg omelette with spinach and cheese, 1 cup oatmeal with berries. Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, steamed broccoli or Lentil salad with chickpeas, quinoa, cherry tomatoes, and avocado. Dinner - Salmon, sweet potato, mixed greens salad. Snacks - Greek yogurt with almonds, protein shake. Image of a balanced meal for muscle gain generated.

true_answer: Diet plan for muscle gain: Breakfast - 4 egg omelette with spinach and cheese, 1 cup oatmeal with berries. Lunch - Grilled chicken breast, quinoa, steamed broccoli. Dinner - Salmon, sweet potato, mixed greens salad. Snacks - Greek yogurt with almonds, protein shake. Image of a balanced meal for muscle gain generated.
